div.div: Filesystem Hierarchy Standard (FHS) - Where Everything Lives

/
(Root)

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(232, 245, 233), rgb(21, 33, 22)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(76, 175, 80), rgb(50, 135, 54));

div.div:
‚Ä¢ ls, cp, mv, cat, echo
‚Ä¢ bash, sh (shells)
‚Ä¢ mount, umount
‚Ä¢ ip, ifconfig
‚Ä¢ systemctl, journalctl
Modern: symlinks to /usr/bin

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 212px; margin-left: 212px;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ passwd, shadow (users)
‚Ä¢ fstab (mount table)
‚Ä¢ hostname
‚Ä¢ network/, netplan/
‚Ä¢ systemd/ (services)
‚Ä¢ apt/, yum.repos.d/

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(227, 242, 253), rgb(20, 33, 42)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(33, 150, 243), rgb(38, 139, 219));

div.div:
‚Ä¢ bin/ (applications)
‚Ä¢ lib/ (libraries)
‚Ä¢ share/ (docs, man)
‚Ä¢ local/ (custom installs)
‚Ä¢ include/ (headers)
Largest directory!

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(252, 228, 236), rgb(52, 31, 38)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(233, 30, 99), rgb(255, 128, 187));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 212px; margin-left: 612px;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ log/ (system logs)
‚Ä¢ cache/ (app caches)
‚Ä¢ lib/ (databases, state)
‚Ä¢ spool/ (mail, print)
‚Ä¢ tmp/ (persistent temp)
Changes during runtime

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(232, 234, 246), rgb(33, 35, 45)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(63, 81, 181), rgb(145, 161, 247));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 212px; margin-left: 812px;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ /home/username/
- .bashrc, .profile
- .config/ (XDG)
- Documents/, Downloads/
‚Ä¢ /root (root's home)
User personal files

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(243, 229, 245), rgb(45, 33, 47)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(156, 39, 176), rgb(245, 144, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 212px; margin-left: 1012px;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ vmlinuz-* (kernel)
‚Ä¢ initrd.img-* (initramfs)
‚Ä¢ config-* (kernel config)
‚Ä¢ System.map-*
‚Ä¢ grub/ (bootloader)
Often separate partition

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(224, 242, 241), rgb(20, 36, 35)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 150, 136), rgb(36, 165, 153));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 212px; margin-left: 1212px;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ libc.so.6 (C library)
‚Ä¢ ld-linux.so (loader)
‚Ä¢ modules/ (kernel mods)
‚Ä¢ firmware/ (blobs)
Modern: symlinks to /usr/lib

div.div: VIRTUAL FILESYSTEMS (Kernel-generated, not on disk)

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 235, 238), rgb(44, 27, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(244, 67, 54), rgb(255, 117, 106));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 462px; margin-left: 222px;

div.div:
/dev (devtmpfs)
Device Nodes

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 507px; margin-left: 213px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Block devices:
‚Ä¢ sda, sdb (SATA disks)
‚Ä¢ nvme0n1 (NVMe SSD)
Character devices:
‚Ä¢ tty, pts/ (terminals)
‚Ä¢ null, zero, random
‚Ä¢ ttyUSB0 (serial)
Created by udev daemon

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 248, 225), rgb(30, 24, 4)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(255, 193, 7), rgb(125, 72, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 462px; margin-left: 472px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #f57f17;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#f57f17, #c76108); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
/proc (procfs)
Process Information

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 507px; margin-left: 463px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Per-process:
‚Ä¢ /proc/[PID]/status
‚Ä¢ /proc/[PID]/cmdline
System info:
‚Ä¢ cpuinfo, meminfo
‚Ä¢ filesystems
Tuning:
‚Ä¢ /proc/sys/net/...
‚Ä¢ /proc/sys/kernel/...

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(225, 245, 254), rgb(15, 33, 40)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(3, 169, 244), rgb(0, 143, 208));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 462px; margin-left: 722px;

div.div:
/sys (sysfs)
Hardware/Driver Info

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 507px; margin-left: 713px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Device classes:
‚Ä¢ /sys/class/net/
‚Ä¢ /sys/class/block/
‚Ä¢ /sys/class/gpio/
Device tree:
‚Ä¢ /sys/devices/...
Power management:
‚Ä¢ /sys/power/state

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(241, 248, 233), rgb(22, 28, 15)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(139, 195, 74), rgb(56, 105, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 462px; margin-left: 972px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #558b2f;

div.div:
/run (tmpfs)
Runtime Data

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 507px; margin-left: 963px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
‚Ä¢ PID files (.pid)
‚Ä¢ Socket files (.sock)
‚Ä¢ Lock files
‚Ä¢ /run/user/1000/
‚Ä¢ /run/systemd/
Cleared on each boot
Stored in RAM (tmpfs)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 498px; height: 1px; padding-top: 685px; margin-left: 462px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #666666;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#666666, #959595); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
ext4: Most common, journaling
btrfs: Snapshots, compression
XFS: High performance
f2fs: Flash-friendly (SSD/eMMC)

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(187, 222, 251), rgb(25, 55, 80)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(25, 118, 210), rgb(79, 159, 238));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 218px; height: 1px; padding-top: 732px; margin-left: 392px;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
squashfs: Read-only, compressed
UBIFS: Raw NAND with wear-leveling
JFFS2: Older flash filesystem
Used in routers, IoT, live CDs

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 205, 210), rgb(85, 42, 46)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(211, 47, 47), rgb(255, 137, 137));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 732px; margin-left: 722px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #c62828;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#c62828, #ff9191); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 762px; margin-left: 693px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
tmpfs: Temporary storage in RAM
initramfs: Early boot rootfs
ramfs: Simple RAM filesystem
Fast but volatile (lost on reboot)

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(225, 190, 231), rgb(86, 56, 92)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(142, 36, 170), rgb(242, 151, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 732px; margin-left: 1042px;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
NFS: Network File System
iSCSI: Block-level network storage
Used for diskless clients,
thin clients, clusters

div.div:
Size: 5GB - 50GB+
Filesystem: ext4, btrfs
C Library: glibc (~2MB)
Init: systemd (full featured)
Shell: bash, zsh (full)
Utilities: GNU coreutils
Package manager: apt, dnf, pacman
Mode: Read-write
‚úì Multiple users, /home directories
‚úì Full documentation
‚úì GUI support

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(187, 222, 251), rgb(25, 55, 80)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(25, 118, 210), rgb(79, 159, 238));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1092px; margin-left: 642px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1565c0;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1565c0, #63a8f6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 328px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1137px; margin-left: 603px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Size: 8MB - 500MB
Filesystem: squashfs, ubifs
C Library: musl (~100KB)
Init: BusyBox init (minimal)
Shell: ash (BusyBox)
Utilities: BusyBox (single binary!)
Package manager: None (image-based)
Mode: Often read-only
‚úì Fast boot, minimal resources
‚úì Wear-leveling aware
‚úì Custom-built for hardware
